text:
A check on the record of "the party of law and order":

21,000 fewer police officers than in 2010

Knife crime: +21%
Gun crime: +20%
Robbery: +29%
Domestic burglary: +32%
Vehicle related: +18%
Stalking and harassment: +36%

Remember this when you vote on May 3rd
